author: Special Correspondent
text:
The Confederation of Indian Industry and Young Indians - Salem Chapter will organise a session with Sana Iqbal, solo bullet rider from Hyderabad, riding her two-wheeler across India and interacting with students in the city on Thursday.

The objective of the expedition is to create awareness against suicide and informing the youth that suicide was not a permanent solution for the problems confronting them.

She will address the students of Sona College of Technology in the city on Thursday morning, a press release of Yi issued here said.
title: Sana Iqbal to interact with students
